product_name: Repel Lemon Eucalyptus Pen Pump Insect Repellent
long_description: All-natural Repel Lemon Eucalyptus Pen Pump insect repellent provides hours of relief from biting insects. Natural oil from the lemon eucalyptus tree repels insects for up to 6 hrs.; formula does not contain DEET. Repel Lemon Eucalyptus Pen Pump insect repellent fends off mosquitoes, sandflies, ticks, midges, stable flies and more. Formula is gentle to skin. Compact pen pump fits easily in a backpack pocket or pants pocket.
short_description: All-natural Repel Lemon Eucalyptus Pen Pump insect repellent provides hours of relief from biting insects.
